nodes.bodyText: Can we instead block relocation from completing? Otherwise there's still theoretically a race (albeit less likely)
Do we have a pre-packaged way of doing that in tests? (I couldn't find one, hence this fix) I could try to come up with one if we don't but it looks like that would take a bit of work.
Something along the lines of IndexRecoveryIT.RecoveryActionBlocker

Thanks! Could've though of that myself 🤦 -> moved the test to the dedicated cluster tests now for this so I can just black-hole the file chunk requests but don't have to bother with cleaning up the cluster networking after the test.
